name: SSF4
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 4
subtitle: Size of Largest Metastasis
notes:
**Note 1**:  Record the size of the largest diameter of the largest metastasis in any site, including distant lymph node or distant organ.  Do not record the size of the metastasis in a regional lymph node.

**Note 2**:  The metastasis may be measured either clinically or pathologically.
rows:
Not applicable:  Information not collected for this  case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is  required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
Described as "less than 8 cm," or "greater than 3 cm," or "between 3 cm and 8 cm"

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
